params._fillAmount: Amount that filler uses to fill the request (this is not necessarily the amount that user receives)
params._token: Address of exchange token in the request
params._txId: Bitcoin request that filler wants to fill

params._chainId: Chain Id of the current chain
params._protocolPercentageFee: Protocol percentage fee (min: %0.01).                               This fee goes to treasury from each wrapAndSwap request
params._relay: Address of BitcoinRelay which checks Bitcoin transactions inclusion
params._startingBlockNumber: Transactions that are included in blocks older                             than _startingBlockNumber cannot be processed

isRequestUsed(bytes32).details: It prevents re-submitting a processed request

params._txId: The transaction ID of request on Bitcoin

returns._0: True if the cc exchange request has been already executed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAcross(address).details: Across is used to send exchanged tokens to other chains

params._destinationChainId: Chain ID of the destination chain
params._destinationToken: Address of the token on the target chain (32 bytes)
Address of the token on the target chain
params._sourceToken: Address of the token on the current chain

setChainIdMapping(uint256,uint256).details: After processing a request, the exchanged token is sent to the destination chain.

setExchangeConnector(uint256,address).details: Users determine which DEX to use by determining the app id.

params._intermediaryToken: Intermediary token address on the current chain

setRewardDistributor(address).details: This contract distributes locker fee between locker and stakers

setThirdPartyAddress(uint256,address).details: Each third party has an id and an address.      Users determine the third party by determining the id in the request.      Third party fee is sent to the third party address.

setThirdPartyFee(uint256,uint256).details: Third party fee is a percentage of the input amount.      Third parties can set their own fees.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

wrapAndSwap((bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,u.details: Steps to process a request:      1. Check transaction inclusion on Bitcoin      2. Extract the request info      3. Mint TeleBTC and send fees to protocol, Locker, and third party      4. Exchange TeleBTC for the output token      5.1 Send the output token to the user      5.2 Send TeleBTC to user if exchange fails and the request belongs to the current chain      5.3 Keep TeleBTC if exchange fails and the request doesn't blong to the current chain

params._lockerLockingScript: Script hash of Locker that user has sent BTC to it
params._path: (Optional) Exchange path from teleBTC to the output token.

wrapAndSwapV2((bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4.details: Steps to process a request:      1. Check transaction inclusion on Bitcoin      2. Extract the request info      3. Mint TeleBTC and send fees to protocol, Locker, and third party      4. Exchange TeleBTC for the output token      5.1 Send the output token to the user      5.2 Send TeleBTC to user if exchange fails and the request belongs to the current chain      5.3 Keep TeleBTC if exchange fails and the request doesn't belong to the current chain

params._lockerLockingScript: Script hash of Locker that user has sent BTC to it
params._path: (Optional) Exchange path from teleBTC to the intermediary token

FailedWrapAndSwapV2(address,bytes32,byte.notice: Emits when a cc exchange request fails

NewWrappedNativeToken(address,address).notice: Emits when wrapped native token addr updated
